text: DARPA is the Defense Advanced Research
Projects Agency it's an independent
division of the Pentagon that works on
far out Science and Technology projects
I think one of the more bizarre episodes
was in the 1960s when the CIA discovered
that the Russians rupture the Soviets
the time were radiating the US Embassy
in Moscow and there was a merging
literature at the time that microwaves
could influence behavior perhaps be a
and implement of mind control so DARPA
started a top-secret project so has the
White House called Project Pandora which
was experimenting on monkeys to see if
microwaves could indeed be used as a
weapon of mind-control but the
scientists and the review board that was
brought in to look at the work said
looked and that it wasn't going to be a
mind-control weapon and in fact what was
discovered is that the Soviets were
radiating the US Embassy in Moscow not
as a method of mind-control but quite
simply to activate listening devices
that have been built into the wall
conventional eavesdropping another
really bizarre episode on the other side
of the spectrum was in the 1970s when
the CIA at the time was sponsoring
parapsychology experiments particularly
with the Israeli magician uri geller
known for spoon bending and bending
spoons with his mind and DARPA was asked
to look at the work that was being
funded at a contractor on the west coast
out in California called the Stanford
Research Institute to see if there was
anything to this parapsychology work
that the CIA was doing and DARPA sent
out one of its scientists a program
manager to look at the work and to see
if there was something there
DARPA decided to stay out of the
parapsychology work I think the most fit
of exotic one when it comes to
technology was this plan to create a
planet-wide force field to stop
ballistic missiles from attacking or
anywhere but really the United States
and the idea was that you were going to
explode you know hundreds of nuclear
weapons in space that would release
these killer electrons that would fry
ballistic missiles and so it was going
to be almost of like a force field and
this was one of DARPA first projects
when it was free
19:58 it was called project Argos
nuclear breasts in the vacuum of space
through a shell of radiation around the
earth within an hour it was called the
greatest experiment ever conducted I
mean this is the whole idea of it was
really quite phenomenal and you know
dark officials at the time argued that
the science behind it was sound but it
wasn't going to make for a four so
basically these killer electrons would
